answers.answer: Yes I feel it often. I did some reading that said it was normal because your blood vessels are expanding and the blood is pumping through you faster...
It happened to me when my blood sugar was high. It scared me until I found out what it was.
Yes and when it does it I get sweaty and dizzy... it's horrible...

Are you overly tired and notice you are short of breath? I had all of those symptoms and I found out that I was severely anemic. I found that out when I had to be tested for diabetes. You could ask your doctor about it?

question: I have yet to pinpoint why this happens but my heart beats really fast at times making me think I have anxiety but I don't. I have a appointment set up with a heart specialist. Has anyone else felt this?
title: Heart beating to fast.
